name: Little Red Riding Hood - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood - Cards Match Game - Jigsaw Puzzle - Book (Lite)
description:
This version includes 2 games that your kids will love: Find cards match & Jigsaw puzzle.
If you like the book, it can be purchased within the app.

The Little Red Riding Hood is a wonderful storybook multilingual, illustrated by Francisco Torres, with text and narrations on every page.

Features:

1) Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
2) Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
3) Several languages supported: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, and Russian.
4) Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
5) Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
6) A fun and challenging Find Cards Match game to increase your children's brain activity.
7) A Jigsaw puzzle game to have even more fun.

Did I mention about the amazing images?

Enjoy.
